Package com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.core.ontology

Interface WSWRLOntology

All Superinterfaces:
org.swrlapi.core.SWRLAPIOWLOntology
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultWSWRLOntology
public interface WSWRLOntology extends org.swrlapi.core.SWRLAPIOWLOntology
Extension of the SWRLAPIOWLOntology adapted for the WSWRL rules.

  • Method Details

    • createWSWRLRule

      WSWRLRule createWSWRLRule(String ruleName, String rule) throws WSWRLParseException, MissingRankException
      Create a WSWRL in the current ontology.
      Parameters:
      ruleName - The rule name.
      rule - The string representation if the rule.
      Returns:
      A new WSWRLRule created from the rule parameter. The WSWRL rule name is the ruleName parameter value.
      Throws:
      WSWRLParseException - If an error occurs when parsong the rule.
      MissingRankException - When a rank is not used but an higher rank is.
      See Also:
      • SWRLAPIOWLOntology.createSQWRLQuery(String, String, String, boolean)

    • createWSWRLRule

      WSWRLRule createWSWRLRule(String ruleName, String rule, String comment, boolean isActive) throws WSWRLParseException, MissingRankException
      Create a WSWRL rule in the current ontology.
      Parameters:
      ruleName - The rule name.
      rule - The string representation if the rule.
      comment - The rule comment.
      isActive - True is the rule is active, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      A new WSWRLRule created from the rule parameter. The WSWRL rule name, comment and state (active or not) correspond respectively to the values of the parameters ruleName, comment and isActive.
      Throws:
      WSWRLParseException
      MissingRankException

    • getWSWRLRules

      Set<WSWRLRule> getWSWRLRules()
      Returns all the ontology WSWRL rules.
      Returns:
      All the WSWRL rules created for the current ontology.

    • getWSWRLDataFactory

      WSWRLDataFactory getWSWRLDataFactory()
      Returns the ontology's data factory.
      Returns:
      A WSWRLDataFactory instance.
